comments.author: angela
comments.body:
I added a complete list of failing tests both to jcr2dav and spi2dav pom.xml at Revision: 918950.
the list is ordered by component. I tried to identify the source of each failing test and commented
the list accordingly. in addition i created a couple of new issues for problem i detected.

with the changes made i was able to successfully run the ConformanceTest in jackrabbit-jcr2dav.
on my machine it took 7 minutes which is far from being brilliant... anyway... better than not running
the tests at all.

summary: spi2dav : list of known issues in the pom.xml
